item.title: "God hates america" protests loollo
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:12, topic:339136”][quote author=goatee link=topic=435520.msg3198630#msg3198630 date=1273076021]

this is older than the internet fuck off

This. OP fails for not hearing about this about 10 years ago. So many documentarys on them as “Americas most hated family”. Get over it they have a bit of sand in their vaginas so walk around with signs.
[/quote]

K i heard it started up January of last year, and its still highly discussed on the news right now. Apparently the protesters are on tour again but this time targeting schools.[/quote]

They’ve existed since 1955. They’ve been picketing funerals since 1998. They’ve been all over the internet for a lot longer then January, last year.

item.title: "God hates america" protests loollo
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Evil_, post:15, topic:339136”]They came here to our state’s capital and tried to protest but we had a counter protest: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HoZK0IvE-Z8

They tried to come to southern West Virginia and protest (where i live), on their way in, a state policeman pulled them over and went up to the window and stated:

“You’re here in southern West Virginia where everyone owns a gun, I can assure you they will get to you faster than we can get to them”

They ended up backing away and leaving, lucky for them I guess, because me and a lot of my friends were up in that mountain waiting to see them, we were going to pick them off one at a time.[/quote]
Love it. The only thing I’d really have to say to those people is ‘know your place’, before telling them to get the fuck out of my face and back to whatever shithole that their maggot god-fearing members crawled out of.

Read full topic

item.title: "God hates america" protests loollo
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:16, topic:339136”]I watched that video, and that has to be the stupidest women I’ve ever seen. What I got from it, is that when anyone dies, it is a ‘curse’ (punishment) from a vengeful god for them and their family’s sins, right? I suppose no one from that church has ever died or had a family member die. I’d be curious to know what they would think if one of their family got killed in an accident, would that mean that they were cursed because of sin?

Anyway, the entire thing is completely ridiculous.[/quote]Agreed. I believe they’re just the world’s greatest trolls and are striving for attention. One thing that I’ve noticed about them is they HATE it when you actually ask them questions about what they’re doing instead of fighting with them.

Read full topic

item.title: "God hates america" protests loollo
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I watched that video, and that has to be the stupidest women I’ve ever seen. What I got from it, is that when anyone dies, it is a ‘curse’ (punishment) from a vengeful god for them and their family’s sins, right? I suppose no one from that church has ever died or had a family member die. I’d be curious to know what they would think if one of their family got killed in an accident, would that mean that they were cursed because of sin?

Anyway, the entire thing is completely ridiculous.

item.title: "God hates america" protests loollo
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

Coal Mining is the heart and soul of West Virginia… well… We had a mine explosion here, 29 people died ( http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Upper_Big_Branch_Mine_disaster ) They came here, shouting that god’s happy when coal miners die and they deserve to die.

They came here to our state’s capital and tried to protest but we had a counter protest: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HoZK0IvE-Z8

They tried to come to southern West Virginia and protest (where i live), on their way in, a state policeman pulled them over and went up to the window and stated:

“You’re here in southern West Virginia where everyone owns a gun, I can assure you they will get to you faster than we can get to them”

They ended up backing away and leaving, lucky for them I guess, because me and a lot of my friends were up in that mountain waiting to see them, we were going to pick them off one at a time.

Read full topic

item.title: "God hates america" protests loollo
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

www.godhatestheworld.com has a part for virtually every notable country.
If I understand what they’ve written then anyone who isn’t a part of their church (including moparisthebest, who shares their views on abortion and same-sex relationships) is a fag-enabler. A tad hard to believe given that many non-WBC members voted against gay marriage in Ohio last year, but amusing none-the-less.

Also, apparently the British b& WBC members from the UK. I could just imagine Gandalf (who’s portrayed by a gay actor, Ian McKellen) screaming ‘You shall not pass!’ at them – they’d get the shits, big time.

Read full topic
